message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY

This paper proposes a new task of automatic article commenting, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques, which are closely related to the proposed task. Additionally, the paper introduces a large-scale dataset, which could be relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and cybernetics (cs.CY) sub-categories.
